duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve in a leadership capacity within the Defense & Security (D&S) Segment's Technology Consulting (TC) account team.
Develop and capture a robust pipeline of technology opportunities to support account growth goals.
Oversee multiple engagements within the account portfolio, primarily focusing on DHS accounts, more specifically CBP.
Lead business development, client facing delivery leadership, and personnel development.
Identify relevant opportunities for inclusion in the pipeline and develop related capture strategies and approaches.
Develop and execute call plans with buyers and industry partners to form relationships to support account growth goals, and support the technology needs of the customer.
Analyze addressable market and buyer spend to inform account growth and capture strategies.
Provide oversight of a portfolio of technology engagements including quality management/review, coaching & development, engagement economic management, etc.
Manage engagement teams of varying sizes, including remote teams.
Assess, identify, hire, and retain current and emerging technology talent critical to technology portfolio growth.

education_certification.credential: Ability to obtain and maintain a federal Public Trust as well as be upgradable to a SECRET clearance (or higher) as needed
